content: Picking the right Spirit to use in your loadout for Black Myth: Wukong can be as important as Weapons and Armor. After unlocking the Gourd in Chapter 1, you can start to capture the spirits of enemies and use them in battle. But if you're searching for tips on what the best spirits to use are, here's what we'd recommend.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Spirits_to_Use.md', within the main section titled 'Best Spirits to Use'.
The content is as follows:
Picking the right Spirit to use in your loadout for Black Myth: Wukong can be as important as Weapons and Armor. After unlocking the Gourd in Chapter 1, you can start to capture the spirits of enemies and use them in battle. But if you're searching for tips on what the best spirits to use are, here's what we'd recommend.
